message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to the right person. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I can only pay up to $9,000. Please let me know if this is possible.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer. While $9,000 is a good price, I'm looking to get a bit closer to $9,200. This would still be a great deal for you, given the product's value. What do you think?
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm willing to go up to $9,100 for your product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
